content.heading: About CodexFlow
paragraphs: CodexFlow began with a simple idea: a smoother, more elegant way to interact with Codex.

homepage.dialogOpenLinkHint: This will open the CodexFlow project homepage on GitHub in your browser. Continue?

donate.description: Like this project? Feel free to buy me a coffee to help it grow!
donate.signatureInvalid: Signature verification failed, information may be tampered
donate.dialogOpenLinkHint: The payment page will open in your browser. Continue?

privacy: Privacy: The app runs fully offline and never collects or uploads any data. If this ever changes, we'll ask first and keep it disabled by default.

update.title: CodexFlow {version}
update.intro: Here's a quick overview of the changes. Thank you for supporting CodexFlow.
update.notesFallback: A new version is available. Visit the download page for the full release notes.

updateError.title: Update check failed
updateError.network: Unable to reach the update server. Please check your connection and try again.
updateError.timeout: The update check timed out. Please try again later.
updateError.invalid: The update metadata is malformed, so we can't tell if a new version is available right now.
updateError.unknown: An unexpected error occurred while checking for updates. Please try again later.

noUpdate.title: Already up to date
noUpdate.message: CodexFlow {version} is already the latest version; no update is required.
noUpdate.messageNoVersion: CodexFlow is already the latest version; no update is required.
